Question.Subject: What happens if a seller does not reply to a your paypal refund request ?
Question.Content: Recently i bought some products from an online seller, his reputation wasn't bad and he had positive reviews. However, after i paid him the money through paypal he told me that he was out of stock and that I would have to wait an 'indefinite' amount of time before he resupplied. Therefore, i decided to get a refund on the product. I informed the seller on this, and he agreed. Since then i have sent him a refund request through paypal for the amount i paid, but he has yet to reply or respond to me. What can i do if he continues to 'not' respond to my refund request?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Escalate the problem in Paypal and tell them what is going on, Paypal will get your money back. Make sure you do it within the 2 week of making the payment.

Answer.Content: Escalate the problem in Paypal and tell them what is going on, Paypal will get your money back. Make sure you do it within the 2 week of making the payment.
